class_notes: This class will meet in person M/W, with additional materials to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: This course is designed for students who already possess basic speaking skills of Mandarin Chinese but are not literate in Mandarin Chinese. It will focus on improving students' reading and writing skills.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1965, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: Y. Tian, Status: Closed
